meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were absolutely gorgeous.
meanings.sent2: She wore a gorgeous dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The puppy thought the shiny ball was gorgeous and tried to play with it.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in gorgeous hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The crystal-clear lake reflected the gorgeous mountains in its waters.

meanings.sent1: The smell of freshly baked cookies was simply gorgeous.
meanings.sent2: The music at the concert was absolutely gorgeous.
meanings.sent3: The little girl found the idea of eating ice cream for breakfast gorgeous.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children playing outside was a gorgeous melody to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The warm sunshine on a cold day felt absolutely gorgeous on her skin.
